ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think I pulled charm off on a level 37 greater kobold, but level 38 gave me a no-no message.  Charm still works great on hill giants and griffons, if ya
ygData.messageBody:
> Heh heh, I forgot about that Harmonic, our charm only works for 8
> levels cause you can't charm anything over 35th level right? Remind
> me not to get used to that song in a couple months.

I think I pulled charm off on a level 37 greater kobold, but
level 38 gave me a no-no message. Charm still works great on
hill giants and griffons, if ya need a quick lambent stone =)

I used to charm back my own group members in CT Tae room, when
they were charmed, and control them myself, that was a laugh.
I tried it recently on the kobold noble, and players higher
than level 37 gave me that same bogus message, oh well.

Harmonic.
